title: Judy Collins
summary: Judith Marjorie Collins (born May 1, 1939) is an American singer-songwriter and musician with a career spanning seven decades. She is known for her eclectic tastes in the material she records (which has included folk music, country, show tunes, pop music, rock and roll and standards) for her social activism, and for the clarity of her voice. Collins is a Grammy Award-winning artist who has released 28 studio albums, four live albums, numerous compilation albums and four holiday albums.
